name: The Pursuit of Profit
description:
ATTENTION: If you experience flickering, please try using Firefox.

You have invented a marvelous machine which converts human lives directly into cold, hard cash. There's just one problem: once it starts, it won't stop! How much profit can you extract before your creation (and your conscience) catches up with you?

Keyboard Controls

  • Run: Left and Right arrows
  • Jump: Up arrow
  • Throw: Space

Changelog

  • [2 hours after jam end] Fixed button on title screen not being clickable. (This had a documented workaround of pressing space instead of clicking.)
